name: insta-utils
description: Usefull utilities for developing software at instashop.
author: pavlos noulis <pavlos.noulis@instashop.ae>

scripts.install: npx esbuild index.js --bundle --platform=node --packages=external --outfile=dist/out.js --format=esm || echo 'Missing esbuild'; npx esbuild index.js --bundle --platform=node --packages=external --outfile=dist/out.cjs --format=cjs
